pkgmetadata.longdescription:
LibTomPoly has the following features.
* Totally public domain and is only dependent on LibTomMath, another public domain library. * Portable source code. * Provides access to polynomials of finite characteristic of varying degrees (it will grow to accomodate) * Includes several algebraic operations. o Usual addition, subtraction, division, multiplication. o Modular versions of the add/sub/mul o Modular exponentiation o Irreducibility testing. o Monic reductions o Comparisons
